onboarding.step_1_description: Discover SNS (Seed Name Service) by Zelf, the innovative name service that frees you from remembering the seed phrase. Access securely and quickly using your ZNS
onboarding.step_2_description: ZelfProof (ZK-Face SNARKs) is a unique, privacy-preserving binary representation derived from facial data, ensuring that no sensitive information is stored or retained during the process.
onboarding.step_3_description: Effortless access to your wallet and seed phrase. Your ZelfProof is securely stored on a decentralized IPFS network, giving you complete control without the hassle of managing it yourself.
onboarding.claim_your_zns: Claim your ZNS and simplify your crypto access

password_step.title: SAFETY LAYERS
password_step.description: This password provides a second layer of protection, working alongside your ZelfProof by combining both your face and the password to secure your encrypted wallet.
password_step.agreement: I understand that Zelf Wallet cannot recover this password. By choosing this additional layer of security, I acknowledge that I am solely responsible for remembering it.

phrase_step.title: WALLET CREATION
phrase_step.description: Your private recovery phrase consists of 12 or 24 words, essential for accessing and securing your wallet.
phrase_step.description_2: Zelf Wallet removes the need for manual storage by encrypting your recovery phrase into a powerful, privacy-preserving ZelfProof. This ZelfProof is securely stored within a QR code that only you can decrypt, ensuring unparalleled security.
phrase_step.description_3: The QR code serves as a robust digital vault for your recovery keys, enhanced by our Zelf Name Service (ZNS). With ZNS, you can easily back up and retrieve your QR code using your Zelf Name.
phrase_step.description_4: I understand that Zelf can help retrieve the QR code with ZNS. However, I am still responsible for safeguarding it to ensure secure access.

zelfproof_step.title: ZELPROOF ENCRYPTION
zelfproof_step.description: You are about to generate your ZelfProof, which will securely encrypt your recovery phrases. Follow the steps below to ensure the process is smooth and effective.
zelfproof_step.instruction_1: Place your face inside the indicated mark
zelfproof_step.instruction_2: Stare at the camera and avoid moving
zelfproof_step.instruction_3: Be sure to perform the required facial gestures

view_wallet.title: WALLET SUCCESSFULLY ENCRYPTED WITH ZELFPROOF
view_wallet.description: Your recovery phrase has been encrypted and safeguarded inside this QR code using your ZelfProof, a powerful privacy-preserving security layer.
view_wallet.description_2: If the QR is ever lost, you can retrieve it using your registered Zelf name via Zelf Name Service (ZNS).
view_wallet.qr_code_description: Keep this QR code safe. To access or restore your wallet, your ZelfProof and this QR code will always be required

liveness.center_yor_face: Center your face on the screen
liveness.center_your_face_subtitle: Please make sure your face is centered
liveness.get_closer_subtitle: Please come a bit closer for better face recognition.
liveness.liveness_error_message:
The liveness check has failed with the following error:
{{error}}
Do you want to try again?

errors.person_already_set: Your registration has a ZelfProof linked already
errors.Duplicated_person: ZelfProof is being used for another record
errors.phone_or_email_is_not_unique: The phone or the email has been used already, try a different one
errors.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, please try again

step_zero.title: Import an existing wallet
step_zero.description: It allows you to transfer your digital assets from other platforms quickly and securely.
step_zero.description2: Our process ensures the privacy of your assets by preventing the exposure of your keys or recovery phrases.
step_zero.subtitle: What are the benefits?
step_zero.description3: Importing your wallet simplifies your cryptocurrency experience by avoiding the need to manage multiple accounts.
step_zero.description4: Easily access your funds on our platform without needing to use your recovery phrase.

step_one.title: Enter the recovery phrase
step_one.description: Please enter your recovery phrase below to validate and import your existing wallet.
step_one.paste_note: You can paste the entire secret recovery phrase in any field

qr_code_step.success_message: You have successfully imported your existing wallet
qr_code_step.description: Your security phrase and QR code are now linked to your ZelfProof. Keep the QR safe to protect your account.

unlock_wallet.title: FIND ZELF NAME
unlock_wallet.description: Find an existing Zelf Name by entering its public address below:
unlock_wallet.upload_description: Or upload your ZelfProof QR Code to continue:
unlock_wallet.drag_drop_text: or drag and drop the file with .JPG or PNG extension here

password.title: THIS ZELFPROOF REQUIRES A PASSWORD
password.subtitle: Enter the password assigned to this ZelfProof to complete the opening process.
password.label: Password

active_wallet.warning_notice: Remember to keep your QR code safe; make multiple copies if required. Also, only unlock the secret key when exporting your wallet

extension_instructions.installationCompleted: Zelf Wallet installation has been completed!
extension_instructions.addExtension: Add the extension to your browser to easily access and view transaction confirmations on Zelf Wallet.
extension_instructions.clickIcon: Click on the extension icon in your browser.
extension_instructions.extensionsCanChange: These extensions can view and change information on this website.
extension_instructions.clickExtensionIcon: Click on the extension icon in your browser.

bridge.title: Confirm your transaction
bridge.description: Scan the QR Code from your Zelf Wallet. Add a security layer by decrypting in your device
bridge.description_2: Or continue with the web extension
bridge.dont_have_the_app: Still don't have the safest wallet installed?
bridge.download_here: Download it here and increase your security for all your transactions
